section.p: provides a browser interface and a command-line interface.

To gain access to the browser interface, users must have login accounts on the master host. (Pluggable Authentication Modules (PAM) is supported.) In addition, users must be members of the administrative group, which by default is the system group, wheel. To enhance security, you may change the administrative group from wheel to any non-system group.

To use the command-line interface, users must have login accounts on the master host, and be members of the docker user group. Members of the wheel group, including root, are members of the docker group.
